input_text:
Job Title: Software Development Engineer

Location: Boston, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Description

Digital Advertising is one of the fastest growing areas at Amazon. Brands, major agencies and partners are relying on our ad technology, and we are applying the latest low latency, big data technologies and tool sets to understand our users' interests and personalize their experiences. We are seeking a Software Development Engineer within our Customer Data & Experience group. You will work with our Professional Services and Tech Integration partners and build innovative solutions to grow the ecosystem around our Amazon Marketing Cloud product and enable our partners to do the same.

Our services ingest billions of behavioral signals every day. Speed, scale, and accuracy are critical to our success. We work in the intersection of exciting computer science domains (massive scale streaming systems, machine learning, data science, cloud native development) and advertising domain (to enable advertisers/agencies/saas providers to seamlessly integrate and control their experience with amazon adtech products). You will work with your peers in building solutions in these problem spaces using native aws, kotlin, Reactjs, Next.js involving development of greenfield services integrating with almost all advertising business verticals within amazon while also partnering up and building SaaS integration products for external customers and partners. We are *not* looking for an expert in any one of these particular domains (although, it wouldn't hurt). We are looking for a motivated software engineer with a proven track record of solid computer science fundamentals and building production quality software systems.

If you are excited about working with the latest technologies to massively scale a new product this is the right place for you. The ideal candidate will be innovative, have great problem solving, analytical and technical skills. You demonstrate exceptional customer and partner relationships skills and love to discover the true requirements underlying feature requests. You enjoy simplifying complex problems and tackling tough challenges.

You can read about the product on our public blog post. https://advertising.amazon.com/blog/introducing-amazon-marketing-cloud.

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:

Boston, MA, USA

Basic Qualifications

 3+ years of non-internship professional software development experience 2+ years of non-internship design or architecture (design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and existing systems experience Experience programming with at least one software programming language

Preferred Qualifications

 3+ years of full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations experience Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status. For individuals with disabilities who would like to request an accommodation, please visit https://www.amazon.jobs/en/disability/us.


Company - Amazon.com Services LLC

Job ID: A2617087

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

build innovative solutions to grow the ecosystem around Amazon Marketing Cloud product
enable partners to integrate and control their experience with Amazon adtech products

develop greenfield services integrating with almost all advertising business verticals within Amazon
